casebody.data:
Lorna BEACH-MATHURA, petitioner,
v.
MIAMI-DADE COUNTY PUBLIC SCHOOLS, et al. No. 13-8709. Supreme Court of the United States April 21, 2014.

Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied. Petitioner allowed *1890until May 12, 2014, within which to pay the docketing fee required by Rule 38(a) and to submit a petition in compliance with Rule 33.1 of the Rules of this Court.
